properties.title: Cocoon Main Site - Milestone 2 of Cocoon Core 2.2 reached
properties.author: Apache Cocoon Documentation Team

div.div:
Milestone 2 of Cocoon Core 2.2 reached
Today the Cocoon PMC released following artifacts.
[list of all artifacts] The newly introduced contracts of cocoon-core-M2 are considered mostly as stable. Depending on the users' feedback we will either continue with a first release candidate or if necessary more milestone releases.
Over the next weeks we will release several blocks (forms, ajax, etc.) that work with the new core.
